title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
An unauthenticated user can execute SQL statements that allow arbitrary read access to the underlying database, which causes sensitive data leakage. This issue is fixed in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7139
  • https://www.ambionics.io/blog/magento-sqli
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211206084839/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-13
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4j6w-9rf8-hg7r
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition SQLi Vulnerability

items.content_html:
An unauthenticated user can execute SQL statements that allow arbitrary read access to the underlying database, which causes sensitive data leakage. This issue is fixed in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2.

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition SQLi Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A path traversal vulnerability in the WYSIWYG editor for Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2 could result in unauthorized access to uploaded images due to insufficient access control.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7859
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220127030535/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-24
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqhf-8jgc-h5hx
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Path Traversal Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A path traversal vulnerability in the WYSIWYG editor for Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2 could result in unauthorized access to uploaded images due to insufficient access control.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7859
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220127030535/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-24
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqhf-8jgc-h5hx

items.content_html:

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Path Traversal Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the WYSIWYG editor of Magento Open Source prior to 1.9.4.2, and Magento Commerce prior to 1.14.4.2, Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. An authenticated user with privileges to the editor can inject malicious SWF files.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7882
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051916/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-23
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ff7r-7rrm-wx6w
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:

An authenticated user with privileges to the editor can inject malicious SWF files.

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the admin panel of Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This could be exploited by an authenticated user with privileges to marketing email templates to inject malicious javascript.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7880
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051916/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-23
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ccjm-rgm5-rjjh

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A cross-site scripting mitigation bypass exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This could be exploited by an authenticated user to escalate privileges (admin vs. admin XSS attack).

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7881
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051916/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-23
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7xqv-jgv6-x2h8

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. An authenticated user with privileges to manipulate layouts can insert a malicious payload into the layout.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7876
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211206084839/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-13
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6qh6-v99h-vh4c
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. An authenticated user with privileges to manipulate layouts can insert a malicious payload into the layout.

References

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This can result in unintended deletion of user roles.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7874
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211206084839/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-13
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8v75-8jj8-77gf
